summary: "Ozymandias," the 14th episode of Breaking Bad's fifth season, is a highly acclaimed TV masterpiece. Written by Moira Walley-Beckett and directed by Rian Johnson, it aired in 2013. The episode resolves a major cliffhanger, drawing parallels to Percy Shelley's poem "Ozymandias." It explores themes of redemption and features intense performances from Bryan Cranston and Anna Gunn, winning them Emmy Awards. Widely regarded as Breaking Bad's best episode, it's also considered one of TV's greatest, topping Rolling Stone's 2024 list of the 100 best TV episodes.
title: Ozymandias (Breaking Bad)
